SLogo.FunctionEvaluate.Functions

Interface TurtleIterable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TurtleBinary, TurtleProperty, TurtleUnary
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface TurtleIterable
    This interface allows for commands that operate separately on each turtle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object doTurtle(Repl repl, Environment env, Turtle turtle, Expression... exprs)
      Operation to be done on each turtle
      default Variable forEachTurtle(Repl repl, Environment env, java.util.List<Turtle> turtleList, Expression... exprs)
      Executes expressions on a list of turtles

    • Method Detail

      • doTurtle

        java.lang.Object doTurtle(Repl repl,
                          Environment env,
                          Turtle turtle,
                          Expression... exprs)
        Operation to be done on each turtle
        Parameters:
        repl - Current REPL session
        env - Current local environment
        turtle - Turtle to be operated on
        exprs - Expressions to be evaluated on each turtle
        Returns:
        Result of evaluating expressions

      • forEachTurtle

        default Variable forEachTurtle(Repl repl,
                               Environment env,
                               java.util.List<Turtle> turtleList,
                               Expression... exprs)
        Executes expressions on a list of turtles
        Parameters:
        repl - Current REPL session
        env - Current local environment
        turtleList - List of turtles to operate on
        exprs - Expressions to execute
        Returns:
        Result of operation on the last turtle in list
